name: Hostvn Admin Optimize
author: Hostvn.net

sections.description:
• Disable Wp-admin Dashboard widget
  • Disable Plugins update, Theme update, WordPress Update
  • Add Google Recaptcha to login form, register form, forgot password form
  • Disable Generator meta tag
  • Change login errors message
  • Enable/Disable redirect to homepage after login
  • Woocommerce optimize
  • SMTP settings
  • CDN config
  • Security settings
  • Contact Button
  • Show/Hide menu in wp-admin
  • Change login link
  • And more …

System Requirements

  1. PHP >= 5.6
  2. WordPress >= 4.9
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins › Add New.
  2. Search for Hostvn Admin Optimize.
  3. Look for this plugin, download and activate it.
  4. The page will redirect you to the settings. Change your login url there.
  5. You can change this option any time you want, just go back to Settings -> Hostvn AO Setting.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

  • Remove CDN
  • Change reCaptcha Label

1.0.3

  • Added: Enable/Disable SMTP

1.0.2

  • Added: woocommerce optimize
  • Added: SMTP settings
  • Added: CDN config
  • Added: security settings
  • Added: Contact Button
  • Added: Show/Hide menu in wp-admin
  • And more …

1.0.1

  • Added Enable/Disable redirect to home page after login.
  • Updated the readme text.
  • Updated the icon.
  • Updated Screenshots.

1.0

  • Initial version.
